page.title: 13Estate agent; Shop,Otford.
page.content:
When we went to the Estate Agents the Manageress answered our questions. We found out that before it became the Estate Agents it was a hairdressers. The busiest day is Saturday. Second- hand houses sell the most and all ages buy them. The dearest house costs #300,000. The most popular areas for houses are Otford and Shoreham.
On July 10th. we went to the Spar Shop. One of the owners answered our questions. The building is 53 years old and has been in the same family all that time. They do get a few shoplifters. The Manager lives above the shop. They deliver groceries and there are five people employed there. They get their supplies from "Cash and Carry". Stock comes in on Fridays.
